data.message: All the hate don't mean shit to Eminem. You think any of your whining and threats will effect him? If you do then you never really listened to him. I'm proud of him, he never was a bitch, never afraid to say what he was thinking. Consequences be damned. Thats Shady!

replies.message:
Stephen I couldn't agree with you more.
Eminem has Fried bigger fish before. 
I would also like to add that Eminem's job is to entertain, which he does best!
Trumps job is to run the country, but instead he'd rather Tweet.
Ems shit is hard and I like him but do you really think trump gives a shit about eminem whining either lol
Dude he just became what he raped against.  That's called (A SELLOUT!)
